Vector dist
Vector distribution

Detailed Description

The first concrete controller class that only assumes that there is exactly one ParameterisedDistribution that it talks to. Has not yet made concrete the process of sampling from approximated distributions.

Definition at line 14 of file BasicController.hh.

void libpg::BasicController::discountTrace (  )  [virtual]

The remaining methods just pass onto equiv Approximator functions. We have to do it in this ugly way because more advanced multiple agent controllers will need to override these functions to update all agents in turn.

Implements libpg::Controller.

void libpg::BasicController::reduce ( Vector &  ,
Approximator::StatsEnum   
) [virtual]

Add either the parameters or gradient or traces into a vector

Parameters:
v vector to store stuff into. v must be at least as big as total params/grads/traces. Will not be resized. Will not be cleared.
s whether to collect grads or params or traces
